text: Noelle is a 2019 American Christmas movie written and directed by Marc Lawrence and produced by Walt Disney Pictures. The movie stars Anna Kendrick as Noelle Kringle, the daughter of Kris Kringle. It also stars Bill Hader, Kingsley Ben-Adir, Billy Eichner, Julie Hagerty, and Shirley MacLaine. It was released on November 12, 2019 through Disney+. It had mixed reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2019 comedy movies Category:Disney+ movies Category:Christmas movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Marc Lawrence
title: Noelle (2019 movie)
